tool_description: Determines seasonal availability and optimal harvesting times for identified species based on location and current date.

plant_part.description: Part to harvest: leaves, flowers, fruits, roots, bark, whole

error_messages: Species not found: Species not in seasonal database for this region
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format
Out of season: Species not available at this time of year
Invalid plant part: Use leaves, flowers, fruits, roots, bark, or whole
usage: Input species_name, current_date, and region_code to check seasonal availability. Specify plant_part for part-specific timing information.
